Text: HBA Summer Clerkship Program Cc Legal will be participating in the abovereferenced program again this year Please note that this program is geared towards first year minority women law students I will be inviting each of you to participate in interviewing some of the candidates during the first two weeks of March Thanks in advance for your time Monica Please advise if anyone else should be included as an interviewer
